name: Mosarrat Jahan
content: Faculty Members Details :: University of Dhaka Department of Computer Science and Engineering Faculty Members Details Home Faculty Members Details Dr. Mosarrat Jahan (Associate Professor) Department of Computer Science and Engineering Education Experience Research Activities Membership Publication Award Contact Degree Name Group/Major Subject Board/Institute Country Passing Year Ph.D. Computer Science and Engineering UNSW Sydney Australia 2018 Masters Computer Science (Research) Concordia University Canada 2012 Masters Computer Science and Engineerning University of Dhaka Bangladesh 2005 Bachelor Computer Science University of Dhaka Bangladesh 2003 Title Organization Location From Date To Date Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Dhaka 21, Jan 2018 Currently Working Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Dhaka 04, Aug 2009 20-01-2018 Lecturer Deparment of Computer Sciecne, University of Dhaka 05, Feb 2006 03-08-2009 Lecturer Stamford University Bangladesh 04, Aug 2003 04-02-2006 Research Interest Subject Description Research Interest (Goal, Target Indicator) VANET security Analyzing various security issues of Vehicular Ad Hoc Networks (VANETs) and proposing solutions. IoT security Developing lightweight solutions for handling security issues of the Internet of Things (IoT). Cloud security Analysis of various cloud security issues and proposing solutions to protect users' data. Blockchain Applying blockchain to handle performance and data security issues. Applied Cryptography Study and implementation of cryptographic solutions for handling security and privacy issues of networks, cloud, IoT, etc. Project/Research Supervision Level of Study Title Supervisor Co-Supervisor(s) Name of Student(s) Area of Research Current Completion Masters Secure Handover Mechanism in 5G-enabled IoT Network Dr. Mosarrat Jahan Shaikhum Monira Security and privacy, IoT 2020 Masters Secure Data Sharing in Edge-enabled Vehicular Network Dr. Mosarrat Jahan Farhana Siddiqua Security and privacy, vehicular networks 2020 Masters Malicious Vehicle Detection using Trust based Mechanism in VANET Dr. Mosarrat Jahan Md Mahmudul Hasan Security and privacy, vehicular networks 2020 Research Project Report/Other Sybil Attack Detection in VANETs Dr. Mosarrat Jahan Md.
